users.description: Table describing user information and when they first shopped

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the user

columns.name: first_name
columns.description: First name of the user

columns.name: last_name
columns.description: Last name of the user

columns.name: email
columns.description: Email address of the user

transactions.description: Table detailing transactions, each of which can be for multiple items

columns.name: item_scan_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for item scanned in the transaction

columns.name: transaction_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the transaction. There can be multiple items in a single transaction

columns.name: item_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the item that was scanned

columns.name: quantity
columns.description: Quantity of the item scanned in the transaction

columns.name: price
columns.description: Price of the item scanned in the transaction

columns.name: user_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the user who made the transaction

columns.name: store_id
columns.description: Foreign key referencing the store where the transaction occurred

columns.name: transaction_date
columns.description: Timestamp of when the transaction occurred

stores.description: Table describing store information, including location and other features

columns.name: store_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the store

columns.name: store_name
columns.description: Name of the store

columns.name: address
columns.description: Address of the store

columns.name: city
columns.description: City where the store is located

columns.name: state
columns.description: State where the store is located

columns.name: zip_code
columns.description: Zip code of the store location

columns.name: square_footage
columns.description: Square footage of the store

columns.name: num_employees
columns.description: Number of employees working at the store

items.description: Table describing items sold in the store

columns.name: item_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the item

columns.name: item_name
columns.description: Name of the item

columns.name: category
columns.description: Category the item belongs to (e.g., produce, dairy, bakery)

columns.name: price
columns.description: Price of the item
